[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [State: Oracle staleness] When oracle config is upgraded, is staleness state preserved or reset? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [State: Fee accumulation] Can fee configuration changes affect already-collected but not-retrieved fees? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [State: Epoch tracking] If reset_loss_tolerance() is called multiple times, is epoch counter correctly maintained? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [State: Freeze map] When set_operator_freezed() is called, is freeze state persistent across operations or per-operation? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [State: Reward manager initialization] Is there a defined initialization sequence for reward_manager that must be followed? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Lifecycle: Vault creation to operation] What's the minimum setup required before vault can accept operations? Can operations start prematurely? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Lifecycle: Oracle setup] Must aggregators be added before vault can accept deposits? Or can deposits happen with no price feed? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Lifecycle: Operator creation] Can operator_cap be used immediately after creation or is there initialization delay? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Economic: Fee manipulation] Can admin change fees to extract maximum value from users without their consent? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Economic: Loss tolerance] Can admin set loss_tolerance very high to allow risky operations that benefit operator over vault users? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Economic: Oracle manipulation] Can admin collude with oracle provider to manipulate aggregator prices for profit? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Economic: Slippage abuse] Can admin set dex_slippage high to allow operators to extract value through DEX trades? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Economic: Locking time] Can admin increase locking times to trap user funds during market volatility? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Economic: Fee retrieval timing] Can admin/operator time fee retrievals to coincide with vault value drops, extracting disproportionate value? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Economic: Operator freeze] Can admin selectively freeze operators who execute profitable strategies to monopolize gains? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Incentive: Admin upgrading] Does admin have economic incentive to upgrade vault/oracle at inopportune times for users? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [DoS: Vault disabling] Can admin permanently disable vault with set_vault_enabled(false) to lock all user funds? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [DoS: Aggregator removal] Can admin remove all price aggregators to prevent any operations requiring valuation? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [DoS: Extreme locking times] Can setting locking times to u64::MAX prevent withdrawals for 584 billion years? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [DoS: Zero tolerance] Can setting loss_tolerance to 0 prevent all operations due to any minor value fluctuation? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [DoS: Operator freeze] Can admin freeze all operators preventing any vault operations? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [DoS: Fee drain] Can admin/operator drain all fees leaving vault unable to cover gas for operations? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [DoS: Update interval] Can setting update_interval to 0 require constant oracle updates breaking operations? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [DoS: Repeated upgrades] Can calling upgrade functions repeatedly cause version state confusion? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Edge Case: Empty vault] Can admin functions be called on vault with 0 total_shares? Does this cause division by zero? (High)
